entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Masset
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Masset Municipal Airport 6:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Wet snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Wet snow or rain. Local snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
